ygData.subject: Happy Turkey Day!
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings  all and Happy Thanksgiving. I just uploaded more pics and created more galleries if you want to have a look:
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all and Happy Thanksgiving.


I just uploaded more pics and created more galleries if you want to
have a
look:

http://www.pbase.com/lord_sturm/root&view=tree

There are more pics uploaded to all the galleries but specifically
the
latest ones are here that is the ones form TRF and the ones from the
JLA Coronatioon Ball last week:

http://www.pbase.com/lord_sturm/jla_coronation_ball_2002
http://www.pbase.com/lord_sturm/trf_2002

If any of you have any more pics from any of the events listed you
would
like me to add to thew galleries, please send them to me and I will
be happy
to add them.


I'll be posting more info on upcoming gigs and other cool projects on
my mailing list those interested can email me privately, but lately I
have been just busy getting equipment sorted out from TRF, and of
course,
teaching, and getinmg my armor and tack ready to begin riding again
on the weekends, since
it is cool enough to start riding in full armor again. So be patient
if you
don't hear from me for a few days.

Sorry for the cross post. This isnt a shameless plug so much as
letting people know what I've been up to in case I havent responded
to email. I have been driving back and forth between Houston ,
Plantersville and Austin and Splendora over the past two weeks.

Once again, Happy Turkey Day.
Immer ritterlich,

-Lord Sturm
http://www.pbase.com/lord_sturm/
http://www.geocities.com/sturmritter_tx/index.html
